segments.source_content: # MDX and React

translations.zh-CN: # MDX 与 React
@@untranslatable_placeholder_623f74e7

segments.source_content: Docusaurus has built-in support for [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/), which allows you to write JSX within your Markdown files and render them as React components.

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus 内置支持 [MDX](https://mdxjs.com/)，允许您在 Markdown 文件中编写 JSX 并将其渲染为 React 组件。

segments.source_content: Check out the [MDX docs](https://mdxjs.com/) to see what fancy stuff you can do with MDX.

translations.zh-CN: 查看 [MDX 文档](https://mdxjs.com/) 了解您可以用 MDX 实现哪些高级功能。

segments.source_content:
:::tip[Debugging MDX]

The MDX format is quite strict, and you may get compilation errors.

Use the **[MDX playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)** to debug them and make sure your syntax is valid.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip[调试 MDX]

MDX 格式非常严格，您可能会遇到编译错误。

使用 **[MDX 交互式演示](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)** 进行调试并确保语法正确。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::info

Prettier, the most popular formatter, [supports only the legacy MDX v1](https://github.com/prettier/prettier/issues/12209). If you get an unintentional formatting result, you may want to add `{/* prettier-ignore */}` before the problematic area, or add `*.mdx` to your `.prettierignore`, until Prettier has proper support for MDX v3. [One of the main authors of MDX recommends `remark-cli` with `remark-mdx`](https://github.com/orgs/mdx-js/discussions/2067).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::info

最流行的格式化工具 Prettier [仅支持旧版 MDX v1](https://github.com/prettier/prettier/issues/12209)。如果遇到意外的格式化结果，您可以在问题区域前添加 `{/* prettier-ignore */}`，或将 `*.mdx` 添加到 `.prettierignore` 文件中，直到 Prettier 完全支持 MDX v3。[MDX 核心作者之一推荐使用 `remark-cli` 配合 `remark-mdx`](https://github.com/orgs/mdx-js/discussions/2067)。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Exporting components {#exporting-components}

translations.zh-CN: ### 导出组件 {#exporting-components}

segments.source_content: To define any custom component within an MDX file, you have to export it: only paragraphs that start with `export` will be parsed as components instead of prose.

translations.zh-CN: 要在 MDX 文件中定义自定义组件，必须使用 `export` 导出：只有以 `export` 开头的段落才会被解析为组件而非普通文本。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_076d64d1

segments.source_content: Notice how it renders both the markup from your React component and the Markdown syntax:

translations.zh-CN: 注意它如何同时渲染 React 组件的标记和 Markdown 语法：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_8850304f

segments.source_content:
<BrowserWindow minHeight={240}>

<><Highlight color="#25c2a0">Docusaurus green</Highlight>
{` `}and <Highlight color="#1877F2">Facebook blue</Highlight> are my favorite colors.</>

I can write **Markdown** alongside my _JSX_!

</BrowserWindow>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_c537a3d3

segments.source_content: ### Importing components {#importing-components}

translations.zh-CN: ### 导入组件 {#importing-components}

segments.source_content: You can also import your own components defined in other files or third-party components installed via npm.

translations.zh-CN: 您也可以导入其他文件中定义的自定义组件，或通过 npm 安装的第三方组件。
@@untranslatable_placeholder_19913a56

segments.source_content:
:::tip

The `@site` alias points to your website's directory, usually where the `docusaurus.config.js` file is. Using an alias instead of relative paths (`'../../src/components/BrowserWindow'`) saves you from updating import paths when moving files around, or when [versioning docs](../docs/versioning.mdx) and [translating](../../i18n/i18n-tutorial.mdx).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

`@site` 别名指向您网站的根目录（通常为 `docusaurus.config.js` 所在位置）。使用别名而非相对路径（如 `'../../src/components/BrowserWindow'`）可以避免在移动文件或进行[文档版本控制](../docs/versioning.mdx)与[国际化翻译](../../i18n/i18n-tutorial.mdx)时修改导入路径。

:::

segments.source_content: While declaring components within Markdown is very convenient for simple cases, it becomes hard to maintain because of limited editor support, risks of parsing errors, and low reusability. Use a separate `.js` file when your component involves complex JS logic:

translations.zh-CN: 虽然在 Markdown 中声明组件对简单场景非常方便，但由于编辑器支持有限、存在解析错误风险且可复用性低，难以维护复杂逻辑。当组件涉及复杂 JS 逻辑时，请使用单独的 `.js` 文件：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_f39e109c

segments.source_content:
```md title="markdown-file.mdx"
import Highlight from '@site/src/components/Highlight';

<Highlight color="#25c2a0">Docusaurus green</Highlight>
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_5be4f25e

segments.source_content:
:::tip

If you use the same component across a lot of files, you don't need to import it everywhere—consider adding it to the global scope. [See below](#mdx-component-scope)

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::tip

如果某个组件在多个文件中重复使用，无需在每个文件中导入——可将其添加到全局作用域。[参见下文](#mdx-component-scope)

:::

segments.source_content: ### MDX component scope {#mdx-component-scope}

translations.zh-CN: ### MDX 组件作用域 {#mdx-component-scope}

segments.source_content: Apart from [importing a component](#importing-components) and [exporting a component](#exporting-components), a third way to use a component in MDX is to **register it to the global scope**, which will make it automatically available in every MDX file, without any import statements.

translations.zh-CN: 除了[导入组件](#importing-components)和[导出组件](#exporting-components)外，第三种在 MDX 中使用组件的方式是**将其注册到全局作用域**，这将使其自动在所有 MDX 文件中可用，无需任何导入语句。

segments.source_content: For example, given this MDX file:

translations.zh-CN: 例如给定以下 MDX 文件：

segments.source_content:
```md
- a
- list!

And some <Highlight>custom markup</Highlight>...
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_eb25bb8c

segments.source_content: It will be compiled to a React component containing `ul`, `li`, `p`, and `Highlight` elements. `Highlight` is not a native html element: you need to provide your own React component implementation for it.

translations.zh-CN: 它将被编译成一个包含 `ul`、`li`、`p` 和 `Highlight` 元素的 React 组件。`Highlight` 并非原生 HTML 元素：您需要自行提供其 React 组件实现。

segments.source_content: In Docusaurus, the MDX component scope is provided by the `@theme/MDXComponents` file. It's not a React component, _per se_, unlike most other exports under the `@theme/` alias: it is a record from tag names like `Highlight` to their React component implementations.

translations.zh-CN: 在 Docusaurus 中，MDX 组件作用域由 `@theme/MDXComponents` 文件提供。与大多数其他 `@theme/` 别名导出的内容不同，它本身并不是一个 React 组件，而是一个从标签名（如 `Highlight`）到对应 React 组件实现的映射表。

segments.source_content: If you [swizzle](../../swizzling.mdx) this component, you will find all tags that have been implemented, and you can further customize our implementation by swizzling the respective sub-component, like `@theme/MDXComponents/Code` (which is used to render [Markdown code blocks](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx)).

translations.zh-CN: 如果您[反解构（swizzle）](../../swizzling.mdx)该组件，将会看到所有已实现的标签，并可以通过反解构相应的子组件（如用于渲染[Markdown代码块](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx)的 `@theme/MDXComponents/Code`）来进一步定制我们的实现。

segments.source_content: If you want to register extra tag names (like the `<Highlight>` tag above), you should consider [wrapping `@theme/MDXComponents`](../../swizzling.mdx#wrapping), so you don't have to maintain all the existing mappings. Since the swizzle CLI doesn't allow wrapping non-component files yet, you should manually create the wrapper:

translations.zh-CN: 若需注册额外标签名（如上述 `<Highlight>` 标签），建议[包装 `@theme/MDXComponents`](../../swizzling.mdx#wrapping)，这样就不必维护所有现有映射。由于反解构 CLI 尚不支持包装非组件文件，您需要手动创建包装器：

segments.source_content: And now, you can freely use `<Highlight>` in every page, without writing the import statement:

translations.zh-CN: 现在，您无需编写导入语句即可在所有页面自由使用 `<Highlight>`：

segments.source_content:
```md
I can conveniently use <Highlight color="#25c2a0">Docusaurus green</Highlight> everywhere!
```

<BrowserWindow>

I can conveniently use <Highlight color="#25c2a0">Docusaurus green</Highlight> everywhere!

</BrowserWindow>

:::warning

We use **upper-case** tag names like `Highlight` on purpose.

From MDX v3+ onward (Docusaurus v3+), lower-case tag names are always rendered as native html elements, and will not use any component mapping you provide.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

我们特意使用**大写**标签名如 `Highlight`。

从 MDX v3+（对应 Docusaurus v3+）开始，小写标签名始终会被渲染为原生 HTML 元素，不会使用您提供的任何组件映射。

:::

segments.source_content: ### Markdown and JSX interoperability {#markdown-and-jsx-interoperability}

translations.zh-CN: ### Markdown 与 JSX 的互操作性 {#markdown-and-jsx-interoperability}

segments.source_content: Docusaurus v3 is using [MDX v3](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v3/).

translations.zh-CN: Docusaurus v3 使用[MDX v3](https://mdxjs.com/blog/v3/)。

segments.source_content: The [MDX syntax](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/#mdx-syntax) is mostly compatible with [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/), but is much stricter because your `.mdx` files can use JSX and are compiled into real React components (check the [playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)).

translations.zh-CN: [MDX 语法](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/#mdx-syntax)基本兼容[CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/)，但由于 `.mdx` 文件可以使用 JSX 并会被编译成真正的 React 组件（参见[playground](https://mdxjs.com/playground/)），其规则更为严格。

segments.source_content: Some valid CommonMark features won't work with MDX ([more info](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/#markdown)), notably:

translations.zh-CN: 某些有效的 CommonMark 特性在 MDX 中无法使用（[更多信息](https://mdxjs.com/docs/what-is-mdx/#markdown)），特别是：

segments.source_content:
- Indented code blocks: use triple backticks instead - Autolinks (``): use regular link syntax instead (`[http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)`) - HTML syntax (`

`): use JSX instead (`

`) - Unescaped `{` and `<`: escape them with `\` instead (`\{` and `\<`)

translations.zh-CN:
- 缩进代码块：改用三重反引号 - 自动链接（``）：改用常规链接语法（`[http://localhost:3000](http://localhost:3000)`） - HTML 语法（`

`）：改用 JSX（`

`） - 未转义的 `{` 和 `<`：使用 `\` 进行转义（`\{` 和 `\<`）

segments.source_content:
:::danger[Experimental CommonMark support]

Docusaurus v3 makes it possible to opt-in for a less strict, standard [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/) support with the following options:

- The `mdx.format: md` front matter
- The `.md` file extension combined with the `siteConfig.markdown.format: "detect"` configuration

This feature is **experimental** and currently has a few [limitations](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/9092).

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::danger[实验性 CommonMark 支持]

Docusaurus v3 通过以下配置选项支持选择启用限制更少的标准 [CommonMark](https://commonmark.org/) 语法：

- 在 front matter 中设置 `mdx.format: md`
- 使用 `.md` 文件扩展名并结合 `siteConfig.markdown.format: "detect"` 配置

此功能目前处于**实验阶段**，存在一些[已知限制](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/9092)。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Importing code snippets {#importing-code-snippets}

translations.zh-CN: ## 导入代码片段 {#importing-code-snippets}

segments.source_content: You can not only import a file containing a component definition, but also import any code file as raw text, and then insert it in a code block, thanks to [Webpack raw-loader](https://webpack.js.org/loaders/raw-loader/). In order to use `raw-loader`, you first need to install it in your project:

translations.zh-CN: 您不仅可以导入包含组件定义的文件，还可以通过 [Webpack raw-loader](https://webpack.js.org/loaders/raw-loader/) 将任何代码文件作为原始文本导入，然后插入到代码块中。要使用 `raw-loader`，首先需要在项目中安装它：

segments.source_content:
```bash npm2yarn
npm install --save raw-loader
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_3e53354a

segments.source_content: Now you can import code snippets from another file as it is:

translations.zh-CN: 现在您可以原样导入其他文件中的代码片段：
@@untranslatable_placeholder_5b5a3953

segments.source_content:
import CodeBlock from '@theme/CodeBlock';
import MyComponentSource from '!!raw-loader!@site/src/pages/examples/_myComponent';

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_18ddbb9e

segments.source_content:
<BrowserWindow>

<CodeBlock language="jsx">{MyComponentSource}</CodeBlock>

</BrowserWindow>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_07b8511d

segments.source_content: See [using code blocks in JSX](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#usage-in-jsx) for more details of the `<CodeBlock>` component.

translations.zh-CN: 有关 `<CodeBlock>` 组件的更多细节，请参阅 [JSX 中的代码块用法](./markdown-features-code-blocks.mdx#usage-in-jsx)。

segments.source_content:
:::note

You have to use `<CodeBlock>` rather than the Markdown triple-backtick ` ``` `, because the latter will ship out any of its content as-is, but you want to interpolate the imported text here.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::note

此处必须使用 `<CodeBlock>` 而非 Markdown 的三反引号语法 ```，因为后者会原样输出所有内容，而您需要在此处插入导入的文本。

:::

segments.source_content:
:::warning

This feature is experimental and might be subject to breaking API changes in the future.

:::

translations.zh-CN:
:::warning

此功能为实验性质，未来可能存在破坏性 API 变更。

:::

segments.source_content: ## Importing Markdown {#importing-markdown}

translations.zh-CN: ## 导入 Markdown 文件 {#importing-markdown}

segments.source_content: You can use Markdown files as components and import them elsewhere, either in Markdown files or in React pages. Each MDX file default-exports its page content as a React component. In the `import` statement, you can default-import this component with any name, but it must be capitalized following React's naming rules.

translations.zh-CN: 您可以将 Markdown 文件作为组件使用，并导入到其他 Markdown 文件或 React 页面中。每个 MDX 文件都会将其页面内容作为 React 组件默认导出。在 `import` 语句中，您可以用任意符合 React 命名规则的大写名称来默认导入该组件。

segments.source_content: By convention, using the **`_` filename prefix** will not create any doc page and means the Markdown file is a **"partial"**, to be imported by other files.

translations.zh-CN: 按照约定，使用**文件名前缀 `_`** 表示该 Markdown 文件是**"局部"**文件，不会创建独立的文档页面，仅供其他文件导入使用。

segments.source_content: ```md title="_markdown-partial-example.mdx" Hello {props.name} This is text some content from `_markdown-partial-example.mdx`. ```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_63d9cf48

segments.source_content:
```jsx title="someOtherDoc.mdx"
import PartialExample from './_markdown-partial-example.mdx';

<PartialExample name="Sebastien" />
```

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_9b048e5d

segments.source_content: import PartialExample from './_markdown-partial-example.mdx';

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_974758f7

segments.source_content:
<BrowserWindow>
  <PartialExample name="Sebastien" />
</BrowserWindow>

translations.zh-CN: @@untranslatable_placeholder_4d2f5bf5

segments.source_content: This way, you can reuse content among multiple pages and avoid duplicating materials.

translations.zh-CN: 通过这种方式，您可以在多个页面间复用内容，避免材料重复。

segments.source_content: ## Available exports {#available-exports}

translations.zh-CN: ## 可用导出项 {#available-exports}

segments.source_content: Within the MDX page, the following variables are available as globals:

translations.zh-CN: 在 MDX 页面中，以下变量可作为全局变量使用：

- `frontMatter`: 以键值对形式存储的 front matter 内容；
- `toc`: 目录树结构。具体用例可参考 [内联目录](./markdown-features-toc.mdx#inline-table-of-contents)；
- `contentTitle`: Markdown 标题（文档中第一个 `h1` 级标题）。如果不存在（例如 front matter 中指定了标题），则该值为 `undefined`。

segments.source_content:
```jsx import TOCInline from '@theme/TOCInline'; import CodeBlock from '@theme/CodeBlock'; The table of contents for this page, serialized: {JSON.stringify(toc, null, 2)} The front matter of this page:
    {Object.entries(frontMatter).map(([key, value]) =>
  • {key}: {value}
    • )}

The title of this page is: {contentTitle}

```
